output: html_notebook

```{r}
#load tidyverse
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
#load file 
musical_artist <- read_csv('musical_artist.csv')
```

```{r}
musical_artist_age <- musical_artist %>%
  mutate(age = deathYear - birthYear)

musical_artists_1900s <- musical_artist_age %>% 
  filter(
    birthYear >= 1900
  )
  
  
```
